scripts.init-repo: git clone https://github.com/g-truc/glm ./wasm/deps/glm && git clone https://github.com/mapbox/earcut.hpp ./wasm/deps/earcut && npm run gen-schema
scripts.build-wasm-debug: em++ --bind -O3 -g4 --source-map-base http://localhost:5000/web-ifc-js/wasm-lib/ -flto -fno-exceptions wasm/web-ifc-api.cpp -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s FORCE_FILESYSTEM=1 -s EXPORT_NAME=WebIFCWasm -s MODULARIZE=1 -O3 -o lib/web-ifc.js
scripts.build-wasm-release: em++ --bind -O3 -flto -fno-exceptions wasm/web-ifc-api.cpp -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s FORCE_FILESYSTEM=1 -s EXPORT_NAME=WebIFCWasm -s MODULARIZE=1 -O3 -o lib/web-ifc.js
scripts.build-api: npm run build-ts-api && npm run build-web-ifc-api
scripts.build-web-ifc-api: npm run build-web-ifc-api-cjs && npm run build-web-ifc-api-jsm
scripts.copy-to-dist: cpy lib/*.wasm dist && cpy lib/*.map dist && cpy lib/*.js dist && cpy README.md dist && cpy package.json dist
scripts.build-release: npm run build-wasm-release && npm run build-ts-api && npm run copy-to-dist
scripts.release_publish: npm run build-release && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.deploy-viewer: npm run build-viewer && cpy dist/*.js pages/viewer && cpy dist/*.wasm pages/viewer && cpy dist/index.html pages/viewer
